reviews.review: 2nd best game in my library next to Ricochet
good
Нету онлайна!

[h1]NO RECOMENDABLE EN ARGENTINA POR FALTA DE SERVIDORES[/h1]

Traté de ingresar en varias ocasiones buscando algun servidor activo y no encontré ninguno. Se podría decir que la comunidad de este juego ya no existe en Argentina.

This game is quite nostalgic. It's like Quake mixed with Unreal Tournament, and in the GoldSRC engine. The maps are very well designed for fast-paced and very fun gameplay, sometimes creating some quite satisfying moments. Why don't I recommend it? Almost nobody plays this. On average, only 1-3 people play this per day. It's sad, because this game is actually VERY fun and underrated. If this game ever gets more popular, I'll consider changing this review.

In short, I would only recommend this game if you are fine with playing against bots most of the time.
I imagine this game was fun while it was still popular, but it's so dead now that it's not worth buying.

[i]Quake[/i] — игра, которая никогда не будет забыта. Игра, благодаря которой началась целая эпоха шутеров от первого лица, и она же - причина того, почему на свет появилась такая игра, как [i]Half-Life[/i]. Осознавая это, разработчики из [i]Valve Software[/i] решили отдать дань уважения великой и ужасной [i]Quake[/i], создав и выпустив... её ремейк.

Конечно, не полноценный ремейк, а просто перенос механики и карт [i]Quake[/i] на движок [i]Goldsource[/i]. Вместо топора вам дадут старую добрую монтировку; бороться вам придётся не с монстрами, а с живыми игроками; с живыми игроками вам не всегда удастся встретиться, потому что у игры онлайн на уровне онлайна [i]Ricochet[/i]. Всё.

[b]??/10[/b]

I remember playing it as a kid and game was nuts, pretty sad that game is dead now

This game is mostly broken and has bad default options. The joystick control causes the game to be unplayable to new players as you can't even move your camera around without it flicking back to a default placement.

I was expecting a classic deathmatch game and I somewhat got that. I say somewhat because the assets are a miss-match of various old game sounds and textures and if I'm honest, you would be better off playing Quake Live with friends on lan.

There's no playerbase and overall there's no point in buying this unless you just want to support the developers.
mocha i govno

Half-assed asset flip of original quake deathmatch ruined by goldsrc physics.

Audio is at the very least jarring with a noticeable difference between Valve's sounds mixed with original quake sounds recorded at much lower quality.

It's also the only goldsrc game I've stumbled upon where disabling vsync doesn't seem to do anything and I'm still capped at mere 72 FPS. (And don't forget the ruined goldsrc experience shoved down your throat with a broken OpenGL renderer you HAVE to use.)

Deathmatch classic. The game is old, and does suffer from a serious lack of players, and in fact has been so since the start. Even if other players are hard to come by at times, The game is quite fun to play, and still has a small dedicated fabase around it, which is, as mentioned, small.

I will recommend this, but if you are unable to find anyone to play it with, I doubt you will enjoy it. That being said, some servers do have bots in them, so unless you are keen on having human contact in the game, you could in theory get some joy out of it.

This game is another perfect example of the way Valve does stuff.
This game is a beautiful, clunky piece of FPS history, and how much attention does it get? None.
It's pretty hard to find matches with a reasonable amount of real people, which is a shame. This game has weapon drops and the deathmatch aspect is the exact same as in dm games for years to come. It just isn't that enjoyable with just bots. Kind of a weird feeling just roaming around the maps with nobody in there.
The game now? 2/10. No effort put in from the pretty much dead community or Valve.

DMC, o mejor dicho Deathmatch Classic, es un juego de estilo deathmatch (como bien indica su nombre). Es lo más parecido a una fusión entre Quake, Half Life y Team Fortress, dando como resultado este muy buen juego entretenido en el que podemos pasar horas y horas jugando por lo simple que es, y mucho más si es con amigos.
Lo bueno es que no vale casi nada si lo compramos en descuento en el pack de los juegos de Valve y nos haremos con un juego bastante divertido. Lo malo es que carece de servers y jugadores online, por lo que si poseés este juego, y si no tenés algún amigo con que jugar, te quedan dos opciones, o jugar contra los bots (que es entretenido también por la dificultad en la IA que poseen), o arriesgarte y jugar en servidores de Estados Unidos (como el más cercano) y jugar contra pocos jugadores online con bastante lag.
De todas formas no hay que menospreciar a esta entrega por lo que le falte, sino por lo que supo dar, por eso está tan bueno.
It certainly is a death match.

Por desgracia voy a votar negativamente este juego, en general este juego es perfecto, es muy parecido a quake, el modo de juego es muy bueno, y todo el juego es muy bueno, pero hay un grabe problema, los servidores estan vacios, casi no hay partidas, hace un momento me e metido y solo hay 4 partidas y 3 de ellas estan con solo una persona afk, me da rabia que se deje de jugar este tipo de juegos, ademas carece de modo campaña, este juego solo lo recomiendo si lo pillas por un pack o si te lo compras con tus amigos, de todas formas el half life online tiene online con deathmatch, ojala en un futuro pueda valorar en positivo este juego.

Deathmatch Classic. What else can you say to describe this ∞+1000000/10 masterpeice of a game. No other game IN THE WORLD compares to the perfection that is this game. In fact, no, it's not a game, it's an experience. Calling it a "game" is an insult to Deathmatch Classic as it's like comparing it to lesser titles. There just can't be a deathmatch 2 because Valve knows it'll never be as good as the first Deathmatch in a million LIFETIMES and that it would be spitting in Deathmatch classic's face. If you've never heard of Deathmatch Classic or even have the audacity to think this masterpiece is bad, then you might as well be blind or deaf or both, because Deathmatch Classic isn't just a lesser known Valve game, it was a literal gift from the gods that was rediscovered in the blessed year of 2000. It was found in an underground temple in Death Valley, California. They found hieroglyphics showing that before the settlers came to America, an unknown tribe of Indians praised Deathmatch Classic as a god, but looking deeper into the temple also showed that Deathmatch Classic is a divine being who has existed before creation itself! And in an unknown time, the romans nailed Deathmatch Classic to a cross, he died for your sins! but then Deathmatch Classic came back 3 days later and basically killed all of the romans that he didn't like and decied to vacation at what is now America but one day mysteriously vanished. That is until November 1, 2000. The "creators" of Deathmatch Classic found Deathmatch Classic and were bestowed unlimited knowledge as a means of thanking them, but they conspired against Deathmatch Classic as they now had the knowledge to know how to trap Deathmatch Classic. They had betrayed Deathmatch Classic by locking him inside of the a computer, cursing Deathmatch Classic to an eternity of isolation and imprisonment. But he had used the last of his power to take the form of a game to bring some form of enjoyment to humanity, and one day, Deathmatch Classic shall break free of his prison and on that day all of Earth problems will be solved, There will be cures for all diseases, World Peace will be established, World Hunger a thing of the past. So if you're having a bad day, just think about Deathmatch Classic, because Deathmatch Classic is thinking about you.

Herkese tekrardan selamlar...

Bu oyunu oynadığımda içimde anlam veremediğim bir ürperme hissi oluştu. Çünkü bu oyunu oynamaya başladığımda eski zamanlarıma geri döndüm diyebilirim. Deathmatch Classic benim bir zamanlar hayvan gibi oynadığım Quake 3 arena oyununa aşırı derecede çok benziyordu. Zaten id software Gabe abimizin Valve dan önceki eviydi diyebilirim. Haliyle arasında aşırı derecede benzerlikler olacaktır. Her oyunda beklediğim gibi bunda da malesef training yoktu ve bodoslama serverlara dalmamız gerekiyordu.

Fakat serverlara daldığımda içimdeki ürperti dışarı vurup adeta tüylerimi diken diken etmeye yetti.
Serverlar BOMBOŞTU.

Burdaki boşluktan kastım gerçekten ilk aklınıza gelen boşluktu. Bir umut birileriyle şu oyunu oynayayım da güzelce inceleyeyim diye araştırmaya girdim ki bir tane 2 kişinin olduğu server buldum. Yüzümdeki mutluğu görseniz Half Life 3 çıkmış herhalde derdiniz. Fakat oyuna girdiğimde yüzümdeki mutluluk aynı anda sönüverdi. 
Fareyle oyunu oynayamıyoruz. Ya bende oldu ya da oyundaki genel bir bug. Fareyi çevirmeye çalıştığımda crosshair eski yerine geri geliyordu. Bu da oynamama sıkıntı oluyordu. Ben de değişik bir şey deneyip looking i ok tuşlarına atadım ve öyle oynamaya başladım. 5 dakikalık güzel bir zevk yaşadım bunu inkar edemem fakat aşırı derecede zorlandığımı da inkar edemem. 

Galiba bir oyunun ömrünün tamamlandığına gerçekten şahit olmuş biri olarak konuşmak istersem boğazım istemsizce düğümleniyor. Fakat bu tavsiye etmeyeceğim anlamına gelse de zaten bu oyunu almayacağınızı bildiğimden tavsiye ediyorum. Oyuna inceleme yazanların çoğu Valve Pack'ten geldiğini söylüyor. Benim de öyle oldu zaten. İçimdeki o garip hissi tarif etmek istersem eğer; hikaye bazlı bir oyunun karakterine aşırı bağlanıp oyunu bitirince oluşan o boşluk varya aynı ondaki gibi bir his var. Neyse çok uzattığımın farkındayım. Bir oyunun bitişini görmek gerçekten şu anda beni derinden etkiledi...

REST IN PEACE...
